column3:
It looks like libtool is the culprit here. Going by the docs and the linked discussion from #5177, checking for c++ before c (which libtool does) is the suggested fix. Something like:

``` diff
diff --git a/configure.ac b/configure.ac
index 17efd98..3ccec09 100644
--- a/configure.ac
+++ b/configure.ac
@@ -24,6 +24,13 @@ case $host in
   ;;
 esac

+if test "x${CXXFLAGS+set}" = "xset"; th
Yup, this works. It is much better fix then the proposed one. Doesn't bring new autoconfisms, only moves them around!\n
@paveljanik are you going to update this pull to that?\n
My https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/5214  should address this also. Apologies for coming in over the top but had this 'tidy up' sitting around for a while ...\n
Jebus, people, this Wumpus IS NOT THE WUMPUS YOU ARE TALKING TO.\n
@wumpus: I'd like to apologize to you. I promise I'll use github's features more carefully next time :+1: \n
